channel.title: Congratulations to our newest mod!
channel.description:
Congratulations to Frell for becoming the Sectional Moderator of the Models section. Along with his position, he will be monitoring something MoparScape has never done before. The new MoparScape Model Contest will be starting. More information on this contest will be provided by Frell in due time. The award of this contest will be a badge that will go next to your name. The badge will last for two weeks long and will look as follows:
[img]http://img294.imageshack.us/img294/3258/mcwaward3ud4.png[/img]
It stands for MoparScape Model Contest Winner.
The purpose of this contest is to improve the work ethic of MoparScape and to test whether the members can handle an award. Remember, the time this award stays on MoparScape is dependent on how MoparScape accepts it.

item.dc:creator: @mod_taharok Taharok
